title: The Luck of the Damned
description:
As human beings we often find it difficult to take responsibility for our lives. We attribute our successes or our failures to a little thing called Luck. But when you believe that everything is connected, and that karma exists, you know you are the true cause of your own good luck, or… your own very bad luck. 

First, Tinder’s perfect match
Followed by, a sailor trying to cheat a deadly fate
Then, a Celtic curse
Finally in our featured story, a very unlucky St. Patrick's Day
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
